segments.text: Look ! It is not working well . Did you try out the bike when you bought it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , there ’ s no need . We can change it within two days if it ’ s not damaged .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But it would save a lot of trouble if you had taken it for a test ride .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know . I will pay attention to such a thing next time .
segments.speaker: S2
